details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم اغفر لي ذنبي كله، دقه وجله، وأوله وآخره، وعلانيته وسره
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ ذَنْبِيْ كُلَّهُ، دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ، وَعَلاَنِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ
details.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee <u>th</u>anbee kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa 'awwalahu wa 'aakhirahu wa 'alaaniyata hu wa sirrahu.
details.translations: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden..
